```{r}
library(EasyABC)
library(splines)
library(nlrx)
library(tidyverse)
th <- theme_minimal() + 
  theme(
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#f7f7f7"),
    panel.border = element_rect(fill = NA, color = "#0c0c0c", size = 0.6),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 11),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 13),
    legend.position = "bottom"
  )
theme_set(th)

dir.create("nl")
#download_netlogo("nl/", "6.1.0") # have to manually install

nlobj <- nl(
  nlversion = "6.1.0", 
  nlpath = "nl/NetLogo 6.1.0/", 
  modelpath = "nl/NetLogo 6.1.0/models/Sample Models/Biology/Evolution/Mimicry.nlogo",
  jvmmem = 1024
)
```

```{r}
dir.create("mimcry_results")
nlobj@experiment <- experiment(
  expname = "mimcry",
  outpath = "./mimcry_results/",
  repetition = 1,
  tickmetrics = "true",
  idsetup ="setup",
  idgo ="go",
  runtime = 400,
  evalticks = seq_len(400),
  variables = list(
    "mutation-rate" = list(min = 1, max = 99, qfun = "qunif")
    ),
  constants = list(
    "memory-duration" = 30,
    "memory-size" = 3
  ),
  metrics.turtles = list("turtles" = c("color")),
  metrics = c("count monarchs", "count viceroys")
)
```

```{r}
nlobj@simdesign <- simdesign_lhs(nlobj, samples = 10, nseeds = 1)
results <- run_nl_all(nlobj)
```

```{r}
color_shift <- results %>%
  select(siminputrow, `mutation-rate`, `[step]`, starts_with("count"), metrics.turtles) %>%
  unnest(metrics.turtles) %>%
  filter(breed != "birds")
```


```{r}
color_stats <- color_shift %>%
  group_by(breed, siminputrow, `mutation-rate`, `[step]`) %>%
  summarise(
    mean = mean(color),
    sd = sd(color)
  )

ggplot(
    color_stats %>% filter(siminputrow < 10), 
    aes(`[step]`, fill = breed, col = breed)
  ) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(`[step]`, ymin = mean - 1.9 * sd, ymax = mean + 1.9 * sd), alpha = 0.3) +
  geom_line(aes(`[step]`, mean)) +
  facet_wrap(~ reorder(siminputrow, `mutation-rate`))
```
```{r}
color_diff <- color_stats %>%
  select(breed, siminputrow, `mutation-rate`, `[step]`, breed, mean) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "breed", values_from = "mean") %>%
  mutate(diff = viceroys - monarchs)

ggplot(color_diff) +
  geom_line(aes(`[step]`, diff, col = `mutation-rate`, group = siminputrow))
```
```{r}
library(broom)
summary_stats <- color_diff %>%
  split(.$siminputrow) %>%
  map_dfr(~ tidy(lm(diff ~ bs(`[step]`, df = 3), data = .)), .id = "siminputrow") %>%
  mutate(siminputrow = as.integer(siminputrow)) %>%
  left_join(color_diff %>% select(siminputrow, `mutation-rate`) %>% unique())

ggplot(summary_stats) +
  geom_point(aes(`mutation-rate`, estimate)) +
  facet_wrap(~ term)
```
